section.name: Introduction
section.p: The DSA/Catalog web application relies upon the following software components, which must be installed and configured before installing the DSA.

section.name: Java Virtual Machine
section.p:
Java (J2SE) version 1.4. Available from http://java.sun.com/j2se/downloads.html.
(NB Be aware that Java 1.4 does not support IP v6.)

section.name: Web Service Manager
section.p: As the DSA/Catalog web application is provided in "Web Archive" (WAR) form, it needs a web service manager or container to present itself to the web. We have used and tested it with Tomcat.

subsection.name: Tomcat Server
subsection.p:
Requires version 4.1 or later; we recommend version 5.0.28 or version 5.0.19.
Available from http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/.
